schema.title: WellOpsNonProductiveTime
schema.description: Non Productive Time (NPT) during Well Operations is the time taken to perform all remedial activities that DO NOT continue to progress towards the planned objective(s). NPT will  include all subsequent time taken to reach the same stage in the work programme prior to the NPT event occurring e.g. reach the same depth before stuck pipe event and back-off etc. NPTs caused by an Equipment Failure may be associated to a DowntimeEvent. An NPT start must align to an Operations Report Activity; similarly, an NPT must end at the end of an Operations Report activity.

WellActivityID.title: Well Activity ID
WellActivityID.description: Identifier of the Well Activity in which the NPT occurred

RigID.title: Rig ID
RigID.description: Identifier of the Rig/Work Unit performing the activity at the time of the NPT

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Human recognizable context/name of the NPT Event.

VerticalMeasurement.title: Vertical Measurement Reference
VerticalMeasurement.description: References an entry in the VerticalMeasurements array for the Wellbore identified by WellboreID, or a standalone vertical reference elevation for all measured depths within the NPT record. If this is not populated, the VerticalMeasurement is derived from the Wellbore default Vertical Measure Elevation.

Title.title: Title
Title.description: Title, free text entry usually by Rigsite personnel

Description.title: Description
Description.description: Description, free text entry usually by Rigsite personnel, but may be amended by Performance Engineer (NPT Coach)
Description.example: Wait on Storm Beatrice to subside before offloading from PSV Edda Fram

UnplannedEventTypeID.title: Unplanned Event Type
UnplannedEventTypeID.description: Unplanned Event Type classification (NPT w/ Equipment Failure, NPT w/out Equipment Failure, Equipment Failure (no NPT)

IsExcludeFromNPT.title: Is Excluded as an NPT
IsExcludeFromNPT.description: Used to flag NPT Events which were later classified as not NPT

StartOperationsReportID.title: Start Operations Report ID
StartOperationsReportID.description: Start Operations Activity Daily Operations Report ID in which the NPT Event started.

StartOperationsActivityID.title: Start Operations Activity Name
StartOperationsActivityID.description: Start Operations Activity Natural Identifier from Daily Operations Report. Requires that the relationship to WellOperationsReport is populated. ActivityName must match a member in the related WellOperationsReport data.OperationsActivity[].ActivityID.

EndOperationsReportID.title: Start Operations Report ID
EndOperationsReportID.description: Start Operations Activity Daily Operations Report ID  in which the NPT Event ended.

EndOperationsActivityID.title: End Operations Activity ID
EndOperationsActivityID.description: End Operations Activity Natural Identifier from Daily Operations Report. Requires that the relationship WellOperationsReport is populated. ActivityID must match a member in the related WellOperationsReport data.OperationsActivity[].ActivityID.

NPTLevel.title: NPT Level
NPTLevel.description: NPT Level (nesting). 0 = Productive Time (not NPT), 1 = 1st Unplanned Activity, 2 = 2nd Unplanned activity occurring within 1st NPT, 3 = 3rd NPT occurring within 2nd NPT, tc.

NPTMeasuredDepth.title: NPT Measured Depth
NPTMeasuredDepth.description: Measured Depth at time when the NPT event started (when relevant) referenced from Vertical Measure Elevation

NPTTrueVerticalDepth.title: NPT True Vertical Depth
NPTTrueVerticalDepth.description: True Vertical Depth at time when the NPT event started (when relevant) referenced from Vertical Measure Elevation

NPTEndMeasuredDepth.title: NPT End Measured Depth
NPTEndMeasuredDepth.description: Measured Depth at time when the NPT event ended if different from start MD referenced from Vertical Measure Elevation

NPTEndTrueVerticalDepth.title: NPT End True Vertical Depth
NPTEndTrueVerticalDepth.description: True Vertical Depth at time when the NPT event end if different from start TVD referenced from Vertical Measure Elevation

WellboreMarkerSetID.title: Wellbore Marker Set ID
WellboreMarkerSetID.description: Association to Wellbore Marker Set (when relevant)

AccountableParty.title: Accountable Party
AccountableParty.description: Name of the NPT Coach/Well Operations Performance Engineer who was responsible for shepherding the NPT through its lifecycle

GrossDuration.title: Gross Duration
GrossDuration.description: Gross Time Duration = NPT End Date/time - Start Date/time

NestedDuration.title: Nested Duration
NestedDuration.description: Nested Time duration - sum of Nested NPT Net Duration occurring within this NPT (can be calculated)

ProductiveTimeAdjustment.title: Productive Time Adjustment
ProductiveTimeAdjustment.description: Productive Time Adjustment duration - time spent working towards Well objective(s) whilst  the NPT is ongoing. Productive time negates against NPT Net Time

NetDuration.title: Net Duration
NetDuration.description: Net Duration = Gross Duration - Nested Duration - Productive Time Adjustment

SeverityLevelID.title: Severity Level ID
SeverityLevelID.description: Severity Level defined on Time and/or Cost impact/criteria

SafetyClassificationID.title: Safety Classification ID
SafetyClassificationID.description: NPT Safety Classification - High Potential Incident, Process Safety Incident, or both. NULL identifies NPT Events with no safety implications.

SafetyIncidentReferenceID.title: Safety Incident Reference ID
SafetyIncidentReferenceID.description: Safety Incident Reference to another system

RootCauseFailureTeamID.title: Root Cause Failure Team ID
RootCauseFailureTeamID.description: Team assigned to investigate the NPT

RootCauseFailureReferenceID.title: Root Cause Failure Reference Identifier
RootCauseFailureReferenceID.description: NPT incident Reference/Identifier to other Root Cause Failure Analysis system

OperationsBurnRate.title: Operations Burn Rate
OperationsBurnRate.description: Ongoing operations burn rate cost (daily cost). Used to calculate Gross and Net Cost

GrossCostTotal.title: Gross Cost Total
GrossCostTotal.description: Calculated Gross Cost Total = (BurnRate * Gross Duration) + Contractor Cost + Equipment Cost + Other Cost

NetCostTotal.title: Net Cost Total
NetCostTotal.description: Calculated Net Cost Total = (Burn Rate * Net Duration) + Contractor Cost + Equipment Cost + Other Cost

DowntimeEventID.title: Downtime Event ID
DowntimeEventID.description: Downtime Event Identifier, used when NPT Equipment failures also captured as downtime events

items.title: NPT Investigation Status
items.description: Investigation Status history of the NPT event

InvestigationStatusRemarks.title: Investigation Status Remarks
InvestigationStatusRemarks.example: Determined that Rig did not have an accurate forecast of upcoming weather forecast

items.title: Non Productive Time Action
items.description: Individual Non Productive Time Action Description

ActionDescription.title: Action Description
ActionDescription.example: Source weather forecast data feed and make available to all rigs

ActionRemarks.title: Action Remarks
ActionRemarks.example: WeaatherForecasters feed obtain and now available in Rig Control Centres

RiskID.title: Risk ID
RiskID.description: ID of specific risk associated to this NPT

PreventativeActions.title: Preventative Actions
PreventativeActions.example: Schedule rig operations outside of known  Autumn storm period

FieldRemediation.title: Field Remediation
FieldRemediation.description: Remedial actions taken by field/rig team when NPT occurred to address the NPT.
FieldRemediation.example: Rig stopped operations for storm event

Learnings.title: Learnings
Learnings.description: Learnings arising from the NPT investigation
Learnings.example: Refer to Weather analytics to perform better assessment of severe storm likelihood

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.example: 20 hours WOW, wait for Wind to abate before resuming tripping operations
